title: 47: OBITCH....BOTCHED...
description:
OBITCH..BOTCHED…
Oh yeah baby, this week we are bringing you all things botched! First Spencer takes us through some horrifying true stories of botched embalming, and then our resident execution expert Madison comes through with some of the biggest execution fails in history. We’ve got an obituary for a fallen starlet, one that’s a little ominous, and so much more. OH, we’ve also got some dumb.ass.criminals! 
SEE US LIVE IN IRVINE ON AUGUST 4TH: https://tinyurl.com/3fvwbsnz

Follow along online: @obitchuarypod on Twitter & Instagram. 
Write to us: obitpod@gmail.com
Spencer Henry & Madison Reyes PO Box 18149 Long Beach, CA 90807
Get a cameo from us: https://www.cameo.com/obitchuarypodcast
Sponsors: 
Better Help: BetterHelp.com/OBIT for 10% off your first month!

Sources:
https://www.nbcnews.com/news/us-news/nh-woman-arrested-4-times-26-hours-loud-music-assault-flna975299 https://medium.com/p/e9151906929 https://www.dallasnews.com/news/2014/06/09/man-sues-funeral-home-for-allegedly-botching-embalming-leaving-father-s-body-in-initial-stage-of-decay/ https://allthatsinteresting.com/mary-queen-of-scots-execution https://www.theanneboleynfiles.com/the-execution-of-thomas-cromwell/ https://milescraven.wordpress.com/2014/11/05/1757-the-execution-of-robert-francois-damiens-why-it-haunts-john-eagle-the-uncommon-attorney-and-why-it-haunts-his-creator/ https://historyofyesterday.com/the-first-execution-via-the-electric-chair-35883926d668 https://www.nytimes.com/1988/12/14/us/murderer-executed-after-a-leaky-lethal-injection.html https://scienceline.org/2007/11/ask-sergo-deathpenalty/ https://theforgivenessfoundation.org/2022/02/16/ohio-inmate-romell-broom-dies-ahead-of-scheduled-execution-on-march-16-2022/ https://eji.org/news/after-surviving-botched-execution-romell-broom-dies-of-covid-19/ https://www.newspapers.com/clip/100669311/obituary-for-glamour-singer-aged-66/# https://listverse.com/2019/10/24/top-10-bizarre-amish-arrests-and-mishaps/ See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
